The claim made by U: S. Rep. Frank Pallone (D-6th Dist.) on Twitter stating "One year today since #GOP took control of the House. One full year of obstruction & no new jobs" was examined.
The expert analyzed the employment data: which showed that the United States gained 1.64 million jobs during that period.
The expert considered the statement from: s office, which clarified that the tweet was intended to criticize Republican inaction in Congress regarding job creation and their failure to propose a serious jobs plan.
PolitiFact National: s fact-checking of related statements on Facebook posts claiming that Congressional Republicans had introduced zero bills on job creation was also taken into account.
